headline: Zimmer Biomet to Report Q1 Earnings: Here's What to Expect
summary: ZBH's Hips business is expected to have witnessed growth on the back of its suite of navigation solutions in direct anterior stems and surgical impactors.

headline: Zimmer acquires Paragon 28 in $1.2bn deal
summary: Leveraging Paragon 28's technology platform, Zimmer enhances its portfolios of fracture and trauma, and joint replacement.

headline: Is Zimmer Biomet Holdings, Inc. (ZBH) The Top Falling Stock with Unusual Volume?
